texts: Be careful not to mix up the letters 'I ' and 'O ' with the numbers '1 ' and '0 '.
Choose the correct country of registration. You risk getting a penalty if you pick the wrong one.
This is based on the vehicle registration details you have entered and the classification information held today by TfL and the DVLA. It may change without notice.
We do not hold details for this vehicle
UK-registered: If your vehicle's make and model details have not been returned, make sure you entered the number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the UK: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm this is the correct vehicle to continue.
If the number plate (Vehicle Registration) Mark is correct but the description is wrong, you can still continue.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA so you'll need to let the DVLA know if your details are wrong or need to be updated.
Our records show that this vehicle does not have the correct vehicle tax class to qualify for the discount.
If this is wrong you can still continue with your application. You will need to send us proof that the vehicle has the correct tax class.
